availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Executive Journal, 1859-1862

body.p:
8
The Governor appointed Geo. W. Thompson Comr of Deeds for Indiana (Rockville)
He accepted and caused to be filed the resignation of John T. Peden Justice of the Peace for Barren County Dist No 9
He appointed the following Justices of the Peace
He commissioned Jesse Gray Police Judge of the town of Foster, Bracken County
He respited for twelve months two Judgments each of $20 against C. C Rodgers for gaming -- Bourbon Cir. Court
He remitted the following Judgments, to with:

row.cell: Clay Cir. Ct. vs John Bowling
